snippet.title: Call of Antia | Animated Intro
snippet.description:
One year already in Antia! You might play like a pro, but do you know the stories behind the game? Check out this new video and discover Antia's hymn: Bringer of Hope!

Call of Antia is a brand new type of match-3 RPG game. In this unique game, the classic match-3 puzzle will be used to inspire the potential of the dragons and heroes as they charge into their enemies fearlessly. Are you ready? Let's reveal the secret of Antia!

Download for free for iOS & Android now 👉 https://bit.ly/3EaE4tu

Follow us on our Social Media to get more surprises! 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CallofAntia/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/callofantia/
Discord: https://discord.gg/XqNAhaVtfj
VK: https://vk.com/callofantia 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CallofAntia
